com.apriori.concurrent

Class SettableListenableFuture<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apriori.concurrent.AbstractListenableFuture<T>
      • com.apriori.concurrent.SettableListenableFuture<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of future result
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Awaitable, Cancellable, ListenableFuture<T>, Future<T>

    public class SettableListenableFuture<T>
extends AbstractListenableFuture<T>
    A future whose result is set programmatically. This exposes protected API in AbstractListenableFuture as public API. It also provides a view of the future as an instance of Fulfillable.

      • setValue

        public boolean setValue(T result)
        Description copied from class: AbstractListenableFuture
        Sets the future as successfully completed with the specified result.
        Overrides:
        setValue in class AbstractListenableFuture<T>
        Parameters:
        result - the future's result
        Returns:
        true if the result was set; false if it could not be set because the future was already complete

      • setFailure

        public boolean setFailure(Throwable failure)
        Description copied from class: AbstractListenableFuture
        Sets the future as failed with the specified cause of failure.
        Overrides:
        setFailure in class AbstractListenableFuture<T>
        Parameters:
        failure - the cause of failure
        Returns:
        true if the result was marked as failed; false if it could not be so marked because it was already complete

      • asFulfillable

        public Fulfillable<T> asFulfillable()
        Returns a view of this future as a Fulfillable. Fulfilling the returned object will successfully complete the future.
        Returns:
        a view of this future as a Fulfillable
